mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUST_DATA (DIVIDED_SET,SIU_CUST_YN, SEX,AGE,RESI_COST,RESI_TYPE_CODE, CTPR,OCCP_GRP_1,TOTALPREM,WEDD_YN, MATE_OCCP_GRP_1,CHLD_CNT,LTBN_CHLD_AGE, MAX_PRM,CUST_INCM,RCBASE_HSHD_INCM,JPBASE_HSHD_INCM) VALUES (2, null, #{sex}, #{age}, #{resiCost}, #{resiTypeCode}, #{ctpr}, #{occpGrp1}, #{totalPrem}, #{weddYn} , #{mateOccpGrp1}, #{chldCnt}, #{ltbnChldAge}, #{maxPrm}, #{custIncm}, #{rcbaseHshdIncm},#{jpbaseHshdIncm});
